articles.title: Haiti President Jovenel Moise assassinated: Interim PM - eNCA
articles.description: Haitian President Jovenel Moise had been ruling Haiti, the poorest country in the Americas, by decree, after legislative elections due in 2018 were delayed in the wake of disputes, including on when his own term ends.
articles.content:
PORT-AU-PRINCE - Haiti President Jovenel Moise was assassinated at his home early Wednesday morning by a group of armed individuals, interim Prime Minister Claude Joseph announced.

articles.description: Lionel Messi, 34, remains in the hunt for his first senior title with Argentina after a tense penalty shootout win over Colombia on Tuesday.

articles.title: June Was Hottest on Record for North America, Fourth Hottest Globally - The New York Times
articles.description: An analysis by European scientists found that other parts of the world didn’t fare much better, with Europe logging its second-hottest June.
